description: This is an HTML source file that implements the frontend interface for a Firebase Realtime Database visualizer. It provides a user interface for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data. It includes embedded CSS styles for layout and appearance, as well as JavaScript functions to handle fetching data from backend APIs and rendering interactive views.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the current selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles expansion of a database to show its tables and loads them if not already loaded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from the data array with special handling for wide/non-primitive contents.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates the HTML for individual table cell values, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content if truncated.
